com.cloudera.oryx.computation.common.sample

Class ReservoirSampling

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.computation.common.sample.ReservoirSampling

  • public final class ReservoirSampling
extends Object
    Generates a weighted random sample of N items from a distributed data set using the reservoir algorithm described in Efraimidis and Spirakis (2005).
